content: 3 repeat this round until the poncho reaches your desired length bottom border once the poncho is complete finish with the following two rounds border round 1 work one half_double_crochet in each stitch and chain space around join with a slip_stitch do not turn border round 2 single_crochet chain 1 skip 1 stitch around join with a slip_stitch this border adds light structure while maintaining the open feel of the fabric page 4 sorbet poncho optional collar an optional collar may be added after completing the poncho collar round attach yarn at the neckline work one half_double_crochet evenly around the neckline chain join with a slip_stitch do not turn this round adds light structure and a clean finish to the neckline without altering the drape terms of use this pattern is for personal use finished items made from this pattern may be sold in small quantities please credit pennymade as the designer and link to my ravelry page for the pattern the pattern and photos may not be copied distributed or reused without permission stay in touch if you d like to be notified when new seasonal poncho patterns are released you re welcome to join my email list here https //pennymade kit com/ef57eb0979 i only send occasional crochet updates 💗 use #sorbetponchopm to share your creation i d love to see your work if anything is unclear or you need clarification feel free to message me on social media or email me at hi pennymade@gmail com i m happy to help page 5
